participant_1.background:
I spend too much time playing with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
my lifes passion is designer french fries.
My father doesn't approve of my music.
I am a cat lover who enjoys making organic cat food for my furry friend.
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.

participant_2.background:
I've never been arrested, but I've had my share of run-ins with the law.
I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both.
i have 3 dog.
i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.

content.text: Hey there, what are your hobbies?
Hey! I enjoy yoga, spending time with my wife and reading comics. What about you?
My cat is my best friend and I love spending time with him. I also love music and cooking french fries.
What kind of music do you like?
I listen to a lot of different genres, but my favorites are rock and indie.
Nice! I love rock too. What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of bands, but my favorite is probably The Killers.
Oh, cool! I've seen them in concert a few times. They're great live.
They are! I'm so glad I got to see them before they went on hiatus.
Me too. I'm hoping they come back soon.
Me too! I'd love to see them again.
Maybe we can go together next time they're in town?
That would be fun! I'd love to.
